   16: 
   17: -module(syntax_tools_SUITE).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   20: 
   21: %% Test server specific exports
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: %% Test cases
   26: -export([app_test/1,appup_test/1,smoke_test/1,revert/1,revert_map/1,
   27:          revert_map_type/1,revert_preserve_pos_changes/1,
   28:          wrapped_subtrees/1,
   29:          t_abstract_type/1,t_erl_parse_type/1,t_type/1,
   30:          t_epp_dodger/1,t_epp_dodger_clever/1,
   31:          t_comment_scan/1,t_prettypr/1,test_named_fun_bind_ann/1]).
   32: 
   33: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   34: 
   35: all() ->
   36:     [app_test,appup_test,smoke_test,revert,revert_map,revert_map_type,
   37:      revert_preserve_pos_changes,
   38:      wrapped_subtrees,
   39:      t_abstract_type,t_erl_parse_type,t_type,
   40:      t_epp_dodger,t_epp_dodger_clever,
   41:      t_comment_scan,t_prettypr,test_named_fun_bind_ann].
   42: 
   43: groups() ->
   44:     [].
   45: 
   46: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   53:     Config.
   54: 
   55: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: 
   58: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   59:     ok = test_server:app_test(syntax_tools).
   60: 
   61: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   62:     ok = test_server:appup_test(syntax_tools).
   63: 
   64: %% Read and parse all source in the OTP release.
   65: smoke_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   66:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(12)),
   67:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir(),"*","src","*.erl"]),
   68:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
   69:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
   70:     case p_run(fun smoke_test_file/1, Fs) of
   71:         0 -> ok;
   72:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
   73:     end,
   74:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
   75: 
   76: smoke_test_file(File) ->
   77:     case epp_dodger:parse_file(File) of
   78: 	{ok,Forms} ->
   79: 	    [print_error_markers(F, File) || F <- Forms],
   80: 	    ok;
   81: 	{error,Reason} ->
   82: 	    io:format("~ts: ~p\n", [File,Reason]),
   83: 	    error
   84:     end.
   85: 
   86: print_error_markers(F, File) ->
   87:     case erl_syntax:type(F) of
   88: 	error_marker ->
   89: 	    {L,M,Info} = erl_syntax:error_marker_info(F),
   90: 	    io:format("~ts:~p: ~ts", [File,L,M:format_error(Info)]);
   91: 	_ ->
   92: 	    ok
   93:     end.
   94: 
   95: 
   96: %% Read with erl_parse, wrap and revert with erl_syntax and check for equality.
   97: revert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   98:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(12)),
   99:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir("stdlib"),"src","*.erl"]),
  100:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
  101:     Path = [filename:join(code:lib_dir(stdlib), "include"),
  102:             filename:join(code:lib_dir(kernel), "include")],
  103:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
  104:     case p_run(fun (File) -> revert_file(File, Path) end, Fs) of
  105:         0 -> ok;
  106:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
  107:         end,
  108:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  109: 
  110: revert_file(File, Path) ->
  111:     case epp:parse_file(File, [{includes,Path},
  112:                                res_word_option()]) of
  113:         {ok,Fs0} ->
  114:             Fs1 = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  115:             Fs2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun (Node) -> Node end, Fs1),
  116:             Fs3 = erl_syntax:form_list_elements(Fs2),
  117:             Fs4 = [ erl_syntax:revert(Form) || Form <- Fs3 ],
  118:             case compile:forms(Fs4, [report,return,strong_validation]) of
  119:                 {ok,_,_} -> ok;
  120:                 {error, [{_, [{_, epp, {moduledoc, file, _}}]}],[]} ->
  121:                     ok;
  122:                 {error, [{_, [{_, epp, {doc, file, _}}]}],[]} ->
  123:                     ok
  124:             end
  125:     end.
  126: 
  127: %% Testing bug fix for reverting map_field_assoc
  128: revert_map(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  129:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  130:     [{map_field_assoc,16,{atom,17,name},{var,18,'Value'}}] =
  131:     erl_syntax:revert_forms([{tree,map_field_assoc,
  132:                              {attr,16,[],none},
  133: 			     {map_field_assoc,{atom,17,name},{var,18,'Value'}}}]),
  134:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  135: 
  136: %% Testing bug fix for reverting map_field_assoc in types
  137: revert_map_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  138:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  139:     Form1 = {attribute,4,record,
  140:              {state,
  141:               [{typed_record_field,
  142:                 {record_field,5,{atom,5,x}},
  143:                 {type,5,map,
  144:                  [{type,5,map_field_exact,[{atom,5,y},{atom,5,z}]}]}}]}},
  145:     Mapped1 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(X) -> X end, Form1),
  146:     Form1 = erl_syntax:revert(Mapped1),
  147:     Form2 = {attribute,4,record,
  148:              {state,
  149:               [{typed_record_field,
  150:                 {record_field,5,{atom,5,x}},
  151:                 {type,5,map,
  152:                  [{type,5,map_field_assoc,[{atom,5,y},{atom,5,z}]}]}}]}},
  153:     Mapped2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(X) -> X end, Form2),
  154:     Form2 = erl_syntax:revert(Mapped2),
  155:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  156: 
  157: revert_preserve_pos_changes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  158:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(1)),
  159:     Pos0 = 1,
  160:     Var0 = {var, Pos0, 'Var'},
  161:     %% Adding any user annotation makes erl_syntax change to it's internal
  162:     %% representation
  163:     Var1 = erl_syntax:add_ann({env, []}, Var0),
  164:     %% Change the `pos' of the node
  165:     Pos1 = erl_anno:set_generated(true, Pos0),
  166:     Var2 = erl_syntax:set_pos(Var1, Pos1),
  167:     %% The must be equal when reverted
  168:     {var, Pos1, 'Var'} = erl_syntax:revert(Var2),
  169:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  170: 
  171: %% Read with erl_parse, wrap each tree node with erl_syntax and check that
  172: %% erl_syntax:subtrees can access the wrapped node.
  173: wrapped_subtrees(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(test_server:minutes(2)),
  175:     Wc = filename:join([code:lib_dir(stdlib),"src","*.erl"]),
  176:     Fs = filelib:wildcard(Wc) ++ test_files(Config),
  177:     Path = [filename:join(code:lib_dir(stdlib), "include"),
  178:             filename:join(code:lib_dir(kernel), "include")],
  179:     io:format("~p files\n", [length(Fs)]),
  180:     Map = fun (File) -> wrapped_subtrees_file(File, Path) end,
  181:     case p_run(Map, Fs) of
  182:         0 -> ok;
  183:         N -> ct:fail({N,errors})
  184:     end,
  185:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog).
  186: 
  187: wrapped_subtrees_file(File, Path) ->
  188:     case epp:parse_file(File, Path, []) of
  189:         {ok,Fs0} ->
  190:             lists:foreach(fun wrap_each/1, Fs0)
  191:     end.
  192: 
  193: wrap_each(Tree) ->
  194:     % only `wrap` top-level erl_parse node
  195:     Tree1 = erl_syntax:set_pos(Tree, erl_syntax:get_pos(Tree)),
  196:     % assert ability to access subtrees of wrapped node with erl_syntax:subtrees/1
  197:     case erl_syntax:subtrees(Tree1) of
  198:         [] -> ok;
  199:         List ->
  200:             GrpsF = fun(Group) ->
  201:                           lists:foreach(fun wrap_each/1, Group)
  202:                     end,
  203:             lists:foreach(GrpsF, List)
  204:     end.
  205: 
  206: %% api tests
  207: 
  208: t_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     F0 = fun validate_basic_type/1,
  210:     Appl0 = fun(Name) ->
  211:                     Atom = erl_syntax:atom(Name),
  212:                     erl_syntax:type_application(none, Atom, [])
  213:             end,
  214:     User0 = fun(Name) ->
  215:                     Atom = erl_syntax:atom(Name),
  216:                     erl_syntax:user_type_application(Atom, [])
  217:             end,
  218:     ok = validate(F0,[{"tuple()", erl_syntax:tuple_type()}
  219:                      ,{"{}", erl_syntax:tuple_type([])}
  220:                      ,{"integer()", Appl0(integer)}
  221:                      ,{"foo()", User0(foo)}
  222:                      ,{"map()", erl_syntax:map_type()}
  223:                      ,{"#{}", erl_syntax:map_type([])}
  224:                      ,{"1..2", erl_syntax:integer_range_type
  225:                           (erl_syntax:integer(1), erl_syntax:integer(2))}
  226:                      ,{"<<_:1,_:_*2>>", erl_syntax:bitstring_type
  227:                           (erl_syntax:integer(1), erl_syntax:integer(2))}
  228:                      ,{"fun()", erl_syntax:fun_type()}
  229:                      ]),
  230: 
  231:     F = fun validate_type/1,
  232:     ok = validate(F,[{"{}", tuple_type, false}
  233:                     ,{"tuple()", tuple_type, true}
  234:                     ,{"{atom()}", tuple_type, false}
  235:                     ,{"{atom(),integer()}", tuple_type, false}
  236:                     ,{"integer()", type_application, false}
  237:                     ,{"foo()", user_type_application, false}
  238:                     ,{"foo(integer())", user_type_application, false}
  239:                     ,{"module:function()", type_application, false}
  240:                     ,{"map()", map_type, true}
  241:                     ,{"#{}", map_type, false}
  242:                     ,{"#{atom() => integer()}", map_type, false}
  243:                     ,{"#{atom() := integer()}", map_type, false}
  244:                     ,{"#r{}", record_type, false}
  245:                     ,{"#r{a :: integer()}", record_type, false}
  246:                     ,{"[]", type_application, false}
  247:                     ,{"nil()", type_application, false}
  248:                     ,{"[atom()]", type_application, false}
  249:                     ,{"1..2", integer_range_type, false}
  250:                     ,{"<<_:1,_:_*2>>", bitstring_type, false}
  251:                     ,{"fun()", fun_type, true}
  252:                     ,{"integer() | atom()", type_union, false}
  253:                     ,{"A :: fun()", annotated_type, false}
  254:                     ,{"fun((...) -> atom())", function_type, false}
  255:                     ,{"fun((integer()) -> atom())", function_type, false}
  256:                     ,{"V", variable, true}
  257:                     ]),
  258:     ok.
  259: 
  260: validate_basic_type({String, Tree}) ->
  261:     ErlT = string_to_type(String),
  262:     ErlT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  263:     ok.
  264: 
  265: validate_type({String, Type, Leaf}) ->
  266:     ErlT = string_to_type(String),
  267:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  268:     Leaf = erl_syntax:is_leaf(ErlT),
  269:     Tree = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(Node) -> Node end, ErlT),
  270:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  271:     _    = erl_syntax:meta(Tree),
  272:     RevT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  273:     Type = erl_syntax:type(RevT),
  274:     ok.
  275: 
  276: t_abstract_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  277:     F = fun validate_abstract_type/1,
  278:     ok = validate(F,[{hi,atom},
  279: 		     {1,integer},
  280: 		     {1.0,float},
  281: 		     {$a,integer},
  282: 		     {[],nil},
  283: 		     {[<<1,2>>,a,b],list},
  284: 		     {[2,3,<<1,2>>,a,b],list},
  285: 		     {[$a,$b,$c],string},
  286: 		     {"hello world",string},
  287: 		     {<<1,2,3>>,binary},
  288:                      {<<1,2,3:4>>,binary},
  289: 		     {#{a=>1,"b"=>2},map_expr},
  290: 		     {#{#{i=>1}=>1,"b"=>#{v=>2}},map_expr},
  291: 		     {{a,b,c},tuple}]),
  292:     ok.
  293: 
  294: t_erl_parse_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  295:     F = fun validate_erl_parse_type/1,
  296:     %% leaf types
  297:     ok = validate(F,[{"1",integer,true},
  298: 		     {"123456789",integer,true},
  299: 		     {"$h", char,true},
  300: 		     {"3.1415", float,true},
  301: 		     {"1.33e36", float,true},
  302: 		     {"\"1.33e36: hello\"", string,true},
  303: 		     {"Var1", variable,true},
  304: 		     {"_", underscore,true},
  305: 		     {"[]", nil,true},
  306: 		     {"{}", tuple,true},
  307: 		     {"#{}",map_expr,true},
  308: 		     {"'some atom'", atom, true}]),
  309:     %% composite types
  310:     ok = validate(F,[{"case X of t -> t; f -> f end", case_expr,false},
  311: 		     {"try X of t -> t catch C:R -> error end", try_expr,false},
  312: 		     {"receive X -> X end", receive_expr,false},
  313: 		     {"receive M -> X1 after T -> X2 end", receive_expr,false},
  314: 		     {"catch (X)", catch_expr,false},
  315: 		     {"fun(X) -> X end", fun_expr,false},
  316: 		     {"fun Foo(X) -> X end", named_fun_expr,false},
  317: 		     {"fun foo/2", implicit_fun,false},
  318: 		     {"fun bar:foo/2", implicit_fun,false},
  319: 		     {"if X -> t; true -> f end", if_expr,false},
  320: 		     {"<<1,2,3,4>>", binary,false},
  321: 		     {"<<1,2,3,4:5>>", binary,false},
  322: 		     {"<<V1:63,V2:22/binary, V3/bits>>", binary,false},
  323: 		     {"begin X end", block_expr,false},
  324: 		     {"foo(X1,X2)", application,false},
  325: 		     {"bar:foo(X1,X2)", application,false},
  326: 		     {"[1,2,3,4]", list,false},
  327: 		     {"[1|4]", list, false},
  328: 		     {"[<<1>>,<<2>>,-2,<<>>,[more,list]]", list,false},
  329: 		     {"[1|[2|[3|[4|[]]]]]", list,false},
  330: 		     {"#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  331: 		     {"#{3=>3}#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  332: 		     {"#{ a:=1, b:=2 }", map_expr,false},
  333: 		     {"M#{ a=>1, b=>2 }", map_expr,false},
  334: 		     {"[V||V <- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  335: 		     {"[V||V <:- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  336: 		     {"[catch V||V <- Vs]", list_comp,false},
  337: 		     {"<< <<B>> || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  338: 		     {"<< <<B>> || <<B>> <:= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  339: 		     {"<< (catch <<B>>) || <<B>> <= Bs>>", binary_comp,false},
  340: 		     {"#{K => V || {K,V} <- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  341: 		     {"#{K => V || {K,V} <:- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  342: 		     {"#{K => (catch V) || {K,V} <- KVs}", map_comp,false},
  343: 		     {"#state{ a = A, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  344: 		     {"#state{}", record_expr,false},
  345: 		     {"#s{ a = #def{ a=A }, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  346: 		     {"State#state{ a = A, b = B}", record_expr,false},
  347: 		     {"State#state.a", record_access,false},
  348: 		     {"#state.a", record_index_expr,false},
  349: 		     {"-X", prefix_expr,false},
  350: 		     {"X1 + X2", infix_expr,false},
  351: 		     {"(X1 + X2) * X3", infix_expr,false},
  352: 		     {"X1 = X2", match_expr,false},
  353: 		     {"{a,b,c}", tuple,false}]),
  354:     ok.
  355: 
  356: %% the macro ?MODULE seems faulty
  357: t_epp_dodger(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  358:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  359:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  360:     Filenames = test_files(),
  361:     ok = test_epp_dodger(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  362:     ok.
  363: 
  364: t_epp_dodger_clever(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  365:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  366:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  367:     Filenames = ["epp_dodger_clever.erl"],
  368:     ok = test_epp_dodger_clever(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  369:     ok.
  370: 
  371: t_comment_scan(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  372:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  373:     Filenames = test_files(),
  374:     ok = test_comment_scan(Filenames,DataDir),
  375:     ok.
  376: 
  377: t_prettypr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  378:     DataDir   = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  379:     PrivDir   = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  380:     Filenames = test_files(),
  381:     ok = test_prettypr(Filenames,DataDir,PrivDir),
  382:     ok.
  383: 
  384: %% Test bug (#4733) fix for annotating bindings for named fun expressions
  385: test_named_fun_bind_ann(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  386:     Fn = {named_fun,{6,5},
  387:             'F',
  388:             [{clause,{6,9},
  389:                 [{var,{6,11},'Test'}],
  390:                 [],
  391:                 [{var,{7,13},'Test'}]}]},
  392:     AnnT = erl_syntax_lib:annotate_bindings(Fn, []),
  393:     [Env, Bound, Free] = erl_syntax:get_ann(AnnT),
  394:     {'env',[]} = Env,
  395:     {'bound',[]} = Bound,
  396:     {'free',[]} = Free,
  397: 
  398:     NameVar = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_name(AnnT),
  399:     Name = erl_syntax:variable_name(NameVar),
  400:     [NEnv, NBound, NFree] = erl_syntax:get_ann(NameVar),
  401:     {'env',[]} = NEnv,
  402:     {'bound',[Name]} = NBound,
  403:     {'free',[]} = NFree,
  404: 
  405:     [Clause] = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_clauses(AnnT),
  406:     [CEnv, CBound, CFree] = erl_syntax:get_ann(Clause),
  407:     {'env',[Name]} = CEnv,
  408:     {'bound',['Test']} = CBound,
  409:     {'free', []} = CFree.
  410: 
  411: test_files(Config) ->
  412:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  413:     [ filename:join(DataDir,Filename) || Filename <- test_files() ].
  414: 
  415: test_files() ->
  416:     ["syntax_tools_SUITE_test_module.erl",
  417:      "syntax_tools_test.erl",
  418:      "type_specs.erl",
  419:      "specs_and_funs.erl"].
  420: 
  421: test_comment_scan([],_) -> ok;
  422: test_comment_scan([File|Files],DataDir) ->
  423:     Filename  = filename:join(DataDir,File),
  424:     {ok, Fs0} = epp:parse_file(Filename, [], []),
  425:     Comments  = erl_comment_scan:file(Filename),
  426:     Fun = fun(Node) ->
  427: 		  case erl_syntax:is_form(Node) of
  428: 		      true ->
  429: 			  C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,[" This is a form."]),
  430: 			  Node1 = erl_syntax:add_precomments([C1],Node),
  431: 			  Node1;
  432: 		      false ->
  433: 			  Node
  434: 		  end
  435: 	  end,
  436:     Fs1 = erl_recomment:recomment_forms(Fs0, Comments),
  437:     Fs2 = erl_syntax_lib:map(Fun, Fs1),
  438:     io:format("File: ~ts~n", [Filename]),
  439:     io:put_chars(erl_prettypr:format(Fs2, [{paper,  120},
  440: 					   {ribbon, 110}])),
  441:     test_comment_scan(Files,DataDir).
  442: 
  443: 
  444: test_prettypr([],_,_) -> ok;
  445: test_prettypr([File|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  446:     Filename  = filename:join(DataDir,File),
  447:     Options = [res_word_option()],
  448:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  449:     {ok, Fs0} = epp:parse_file(Filename, Options),
  450:     Fs = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  451:     PP = erl_prettypr:format(Fs, [{paper,  120}, {ribbon, 110}]),
  452:     io:put_chars(PP),
  453:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir, File),
  454:     ok = file:write_file(OutFile,unicode:characters_to_binary(PP)),
  455:     io:format("Parsing OutFile: ~ts~n", [OutFile]),
  456:     {ok, Fs2} = epp:parse_file(OutFile, Options),
  457:     case [Error || {error, _} = Error <- Fs2] of
  458:         [] ->
  459:             ok;
  460:         Errors ->
  461:             ct:fail(Errors)
  462:     end,
  463:     test_prettypr(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  464: 
  465: test_epp_dodger([], _, _) -> ok;
  466: test_epp_dodger([Filename|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  467:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  468:     Options  = [{feature, maybe_expr, enable}],
  469:     InFile   = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
  470:     Parsers  = [{fun(File) -> epp_dodger:parse_file(File, Options) end,parse_file},
  471: 		{fun(File) -> epp_dodger:quick_parse_file(File,
  472:                                                           Options) end,quick_parse_file},
  473: 		{fun (File) ->
  474: 			{ok,Dev} = file:open(File,[read]),
  475: 			Res = epp_dodger:parse(Dev, Options),
  476: 			file:close(File),
  477: 			Res
  478: 		 end, parse},
  479: 		{fun (File) ->
  480: 			{ok,Dev} = file:open(File,[read]),
  481: 			Res = epp_dodger:quick_parse(Dev, Options),
  482: 			file:close(File),
  483: 			Res
  484: 		 end, quick_parse}],
  485:     FsForms  = parse_with(Parsers, InFile),
  486:     ok = pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename),
  487:     test_epp_dodger(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  488: 
  489: test_epp_dodger_clever([], _, _) -> ok;
  490: test_epp_dodger_clever([Filename|Files],DataDir,PrivDir) ->
  491:     io:format("Parsing ~p~n", [Filename]),
  492:     InFile   = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
  493:     Parsers  = [{fun(File) ->
  494:                          epp_dodger:parse_file(File, [clever])
  495:                  end, parse_file},
  496: 		{fun(File) ->
  497:                          epp_dodger:quick_parse_file(File, [clever])
  498:                  end, quick_parse_file}],
  499:     FsForms  = parse_with(Parsers, InFile),
  500:     ok = pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename),
  501:     test_epp_dodger_clever(Files,DataDir,PrivDir).
  502: 
  503: parse_with([],_) -> [];
  504: parse_with([{Fun,ParserType}|Funs],File) ->
  505:     {ok, Fs} = Fun(File),
  506:     ErrorMarkers = [begin
  507:                         print_error_markers(F, File),
  508:                         F
  509:                     end
  510:                     || F <- Fs,
  511:                        erl_syntax:type(F) =:= error_marker],
  512:     [] = ErrorMarkers,
  513:     [{Fs,ParserType}|parse_with(Funs,File)].
  514: 
  515: pretty_print_parse_forms([],_,_) -> ok;
  516: pretty_print_parse_forms([{Fs0,Type}|FsForms],PrivDir,Filename) ->
  517:     Parser  = atom_to_list(Type),
  518:     OutFile = filename:join(PrivDir, Parser ++"_" ++ Filename),
  519:     io:format("Pretty print ~p (~w) to ~p~n", [Filename,Type,OutFile]),
  520:     Comment = fun (Node,{CntCase,CntTry}=Cnt) ->
  521: 		      case erl_syntax:type(Node) of
  522: 			  case_expr ->
  523: 			      C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["Before a case expression"]),
  524: 			      Node1 = erl_syntax:add_precomments([C1],Node),
  525: 			      C2    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["After a case expression"]),
  526: 			      Node2 = erl_syntax:add_postcomments([C2],Node1),
  527: 			      {Node2,{CntCase+1,CntTry}};
  528: 			  try_expr ->
  529: 			      C1    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["Before a try expression"]),
  530: 			      Node1 = erl_syntax:set_precomments(Node,
  531: 						     erl_syntax:get_precomments(Node) ++ [C1]),
  532: 			      C2    = erl_syntax:comment(2,["After a try expression"]),
  533: 			      Node2 = erl_syntax:set_postcomments(Node1,
  534: 						     erl_syntax:get_postcomments(Node1) ++ [C2]),
  535: 			      {Node2,{CntCase,CntTry+1}};
  536: 			  _ ->
  537: 			      {Node,Cnt}
  538: 		      end
  539: 	      end,
  540:     Fs1 = erl_syntax:form_list(Fs0),
  541:     {Fs2,{CC,CT}} = erl_syntax_lib:mapfold(Comment,{0,0}, Fs1),
  542:     io:format("Commented on ~w cases and ~w tries~n", [CC,CT]),
  543:     PP  = erl_prettypr:format(Fs2),
  544:     ok  = file:write_file(OutFile,unicode:characters_to_binary(PP)),
  545:     pretty_print_parse_forms(FsForms,PrivDir,Filename).
  546: 
  547: 
  548: validate(_,[]) -> ok;
  549: validate(F,[V|Vs]) ->
  550:     ok = F(V),
  551:     validate(F,Vs).
  552: 
  553: 
  554: validate_abstract_type({Lit,Type}) ->
  555:     Tree = erl_syntax:abstract(Lit),
  556:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,Tree),
  557:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  558:     true = erl_syntax:is_literal(Tree),
  559:     ErlT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  560:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  561:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,ErlT),
  562:     Conc = erl_syntax:concrete(Tree),
  563:     Lit  = Conc,
  564:     ok.
  565: 
  566: validate_erl_parse_type({String,Type,Leaf}) ->
  567:     ErlT = string_to_expr(String),
  568:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,ErlT),
  569:     Type = erl_syntax:type(ErlT),
  570:     Leaf = erl_syntax:is_leaf(ErlT),
  571:     Tree = erl_syntax_lib:map(fun(Node) -> Node end, ErlT),
  572:     Type = erl_syntax:type(Tree),
  573:     _    = erl_syntax:meta(Tree),
  574:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,Tree),
  575:     RevT = erl_syntax:revert(Tree),
  576:     ok   = validate_special_type(Type,RevT),
  577:     Type = erl_syntax:type(RevT),
  578:     ok.
  579: 
  580: validate_special_type(string,Node) ->
  581:     Val  = erl_syntax:string_value(Node),
  582:     true = erl_syntax:is_string(Node,Val),
  583:     _    = erl_syntax:string_literal(Node),
  584:     ok;
  585: validate_special_type(variable,Node) ->
  586:     _ = erl_syntax:variable_literal(Node),
  587:     ok;
  588: validate_special_type(fun_expr,Node) ->
  589:     A = erl_syntax:fun_expr_arity(Node),
  590:     true = is_integer(A),
  591:     ok;
  592: validate_special_type(named_fun_expr,Node) ->
  593:     A = erl_syntax:named_fun_expr_arity(Node),
  594:     true = is_integer(A),
  595:     ok;
  596: validate_special_type(tuple,Node) ->
  597:     Size = erl_syntax:tuple_size(Node),
  598:     true = is_integer(Size),
  599:     ok;
  600: validate_special_type(float,Node) ->
  601:     Str   = erl_syntax:float_literal(Node),
  602:     Val   = list_to_float(Str),
  603:     Val   = erl_syntax:float_value(Node),
  604:     false = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  605:     false = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  606:     ok;
  607: validate_special_type(integer,Node) ->
  608:     Str   = erl_syntax:integer_literal(Node),
  609:     Val   = list_to_integer(Str),
  610:     true  = erl_syntax:is_integer(Node,Val),
  611:     Val   = erl_syntax:integer_value(Node),
  612:     false = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  613:     ok;
  614: validate_special_type(nil,Node) ->
  615:     true  = erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node),
  616:     ok;
  617: validate_special_type(list,Node) ->
  618:     true  = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  619:     _     = erl_syntax:list_tail(Node),
  620:     ErrV  = erl_syntax:list_head(Node),
  621:     false = erl_syntax:is_string(Node,ErrV),
  622:     Norm  = erl_syntax:normalize_list(Node),
  623:     list  = erl_syntax:type(Norm),
  624:     case erl_syntax:is_proper_list(Node) of
  625: 	true ->
  626: 	    true = erl_syntax:is_list_skeleton(Node),
  627: 	    Compact = erl_syntax:compact_list(Node),
  628: 	    list = erl_syntax:type(Compact),
  629: 	    [_|_] = erl_syntax:list_elements(Node),
  630: 	    _  = erl_syntax:list_elements(Node),
  631: 	    N  = erl_syntax:list_length(Node),
  632: 	    true = N > 0,
  633: 	    ok;
  634: 	false ->
  635: 	    ok
  636:     end;
  637: validate_special_type(_,_) ->
  638:     ok.
  639: 
  640: %%% scan_and_parse
  641: 
  642: string_to_expr(String) ->
  643:     io:format("Str: ~p~n", [String]),
  644:     {ok, Ts, _} = erl_scan:string(String++"."),
  645:     {ok,[Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Ts),
  646:     Expr.
  647: 
  648: string_to_type(String) ->
  649:     io:format("Str: ~p~n", [String]),
  650:     {ok,Ts,_} = erl_scan:string("-type foo() :: "++String++".", 0),
  651:     {ok,Form} = erl_parse:parse_form(Ts),
  652:     {attribute,_,type,{foo,Type,_NoParms=[]}} = Form,
  653:     Type.
  654: 
  655: 
  656: p_run(Test, List) ->
  657:     N = erlang:system_info(schedulers),
  658:     p_run_loop(Test, List, N, [], 0).
  659: 
  660: p_run_loop(_, [], _, [], Errors) ->
  661:     Errors;
  662: p_run_loop(Test, [H|T], N, Refs, Errors) when length(Refs) < N ->
  663:     {_,Ref} = erlang:spawn_monitor(fun() -> exit(Test(H)) end),
  664:     p_run_loop(Test, T, N, [Ref|Refs], Errors);
  665: p_run_loop(Test, List, N, Refs0, Errors0) ->
  666:     receive
  667: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Res} ->
  668: 	    Errors = case Res of
  669: 			 ok -> Errors0;
  670: 			 error -> Errors0+1
  671: 		     end,
  672: 	    Refs = Refs0 -- [Ref],
  673: 	    p_run_loop(Test, List, N, Refs, Errors)
  674:     end.
  675: 
  676: res_word_option() ->
  677:     Options = [{feature, maybe_expr, enable}],
  678:     {ok, {_Ftrs, ResWordFun}} =
  679:         erl_features:keyword_fun(Options, fun erl_scan:f_reserved_word/1),
  680:     {reserved_word_fun, ResWordFun}.
